alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:12PM CDT until May 07 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washington County in north central Kansas... Northwestern Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Odell, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanover, Oketo and Bremen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
